title: Wrath of Calth
content:
The Wrath of Calth is a Fellblade Super Heavy Tank of the Ultramarines Chapter and took part in the Horus Heresy battles.[1]
 Wrath of Calth[1]
 The following information is not to be regarded as officially sanctioned and/ or is not written from an in-universe point of view. A detailed explanation of the term "Trivia" as used in the Lexicanum can be found here.
 The Wrath of Calth was created by Andy Wardle - one of the winners of Golden Demon: Horus Heresy in 2016.[1]
